casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
NORTH CAROLINA, et al. 40P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Arthur O. Armstrong, for Armstrong, Arthur O.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of March 2018 by Plaintiff for Leave to File a Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
